statements: SELECT * FROM GeneticVariationData WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1';
SELECT gene_name, allele_frequency FROM GeneticVariationData WHERE population_id = 1;
SELECT variation_type, allele_frequency FROM GeneticVariationData WHERE allele_frequency > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM GeneticVariationData ORDER BY allele_frequency DESC;
SELECT gene_name, variation_type FROM GeneticVariationData WHERE variation_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM GeneticVariationData WHERE population_id = 1;
SELECT variation_id, gene_name, allele_frequency FROM GeneticVariationData WHERE allele_frequency > 0.5;
SELECT gene_name, variation_type FROM GeneticVariationData WHERE population_id = 2 ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM GeneticVariationData WHERE variation_type = 'Insertion' AND population_id = 3;
SELECT variation_id, gene_name, allele_frequency FROM GeneticVariationData WHERE population_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY allele_frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM Analyze_Genetic_Variation
SELECT sample_id, genotype FROM Analyze_Genetic_Variation WHERE chromosome = 'X'
SELECT position, genotype, allele FROM Analyze_Genetic_Variation WHERE sample_id = 1
SELECT study_name, sample_size FROM Population_Study
SELECT * FROM Population_Study WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Analyze_Genetic_Variation ORDER BY sample_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT chromosome, genotype FROM Analyze_Genetic_Variation WHERE position > 1000;
SELECT genotype, position, chromosome FROM Analyze_Genetic_Variation WHERE allele='A';
SELECT sample_id, genotype, chromosome FROM Analyze_Genetic_Variation WHERE genotype='AA' OR genotype='CC';
SELECT * FROM Population_Study WHERE sample_size BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY study_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sample_data;
SELECT * FROM population ORDER BY population_name DESC;
SELECT genotype FROM sample_data WHERE sample_id = 1;
SELECT variant_id, variant_type FROM variant WHERE chromosome = 'X';
SELECT population_id, COUNT(sample_id) AS sample_count FROM sample_data GROUP BY population_id ORDER BY sample_count DESC;
SELECT sample_id, population_id, variant_id, genotype FROM sample_data WHERE population_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM population WHERE population_name = 'Europe';
SELECT variant_id, chromosome, position FROM variant ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT sample_id, genotype FROM sample_data WHERE genotype IS NOT NULL AND population_id = 2;
SELECT sample_id, variant_id, genotype FROM sample_data JOIN variant ON sample_data.variant_id = variant.variant_id;
SELECT * FROM population_studies;
SELECT study_name, population_name FROM population_studies WHERE study_id = 1;
SELECT variant_name, chromosome, position FROM genetic_variants ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT sample_name, genotype FROM samples INNER JOIN variant_calls ON samples.sample_id = variant_calls.sample_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_samples FROM samples;
SELECT * FROM variant_calls WHERE genotype = 'AA';

SELECT sample_name, variant_name, chromosome FROM samples JOIN variant_calls ON samples.sample_id = variant_calls.sample_id JOIN genetic_variants ON variant_calls.variant_id = genetic_variants.variant_id;
SELECT call_id, genotype, allele_frequency FROM variant_calls JOIN genetic_variants ON variant_calls.variant_id = genetic_variants.variant_id WHERE allele_frequency > 0.2;
SELECT study_name, population_name, COUNT(sample_id) AS sample_count FROM population_studies LEFT JOIN samples ON population_studies.study_id = samples.study_id GROUP BY study_name, population_name;
SELECT variant_name, chromosome, position FROM genetic_variants WHERE position BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY chromosome ASC, position DESC;
SELECT * FROM GeneticVariationData;
SELECT population_id, gene_name FROM GeneticVariationData ORDER BY population_id DESC;
SELECT variation_type, allele_frequency FROM GeneticVariationData WHERE allele_frequency > 0.5;
SELECT population_name, country, continent FROM Population WHERE continent = 'Europe';
SELECT id, publication_year, research_institute FROM Study ORDER BY publication_year;
SELECT id, gene_name, allele_frequency FROM GeneticVariationData WHERE variation_type = 'SNP' ORDER BY allele_frequency DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Population WHERE continent = 'Europe';
SELECT study_name, publication_year, research_institute FROM Study WHERE publication_year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020 ORDER BY publication_year DESC;
SELECT r.researcher_name, s.sample_name, s.collection_date FROM Researcher r JOIN Sample s ON r.id = s.researcher_id WHERE r.institution = 'Harvard University';
SELECT p.population_name, p.country, s.sample_size FROM Population p JOIN Study st ON p.id = st.sample_id GROUP BY p.population_name ORDER BY sample_size DESC LIMIT 5;
